body.p:
State of Kentucky
Daviess County Sct.

Preston Troutman states on oath that he was prevented from attending the trial in the Bullitt Circuit Court at the last April Term of the Comth of Ky agt himself taken in consequence of the sickness of his wife, who was So ill that he could not leave her
Lewis McMurtry also states on oath that the statements of the above affidavit are true,
Sworn to before me this 23d July 1861, by Preston Troutman & Lewis McMurty
Wm. B. Wall N. P D C
